lines.text:
[practicing fly-casting]
You know, most people think it's the arm or the wrist. But actually, it's all in the mind. Rhythm, natural flow. They're important. The mind must be completely focused. You listening?
There's nothing out here. Nothing anybody wants. Nothing anybody needs. So what are we doing here? Nothing.

[at gunpoint]
It never pays to shoot the mechanic, mate.
